description:
As a customer on DemoBlaze e-commerce website
  I want to place orders for items in my cart
  So that I can complete my purchase and receive the products

steps.name: Given I navigate to the DemoBlaze home page
When I navigate to cart page
And I click place order button
Fill order details with specified data

parameters.name: dataTable
parameters.value:
| field      | value            |
| name       | John Doe         |
| country    | USA              |
| city       | New York         |
| creditCard | 1234567890123456 |
| month      | 12               |
| year       | 2025             |

steps.name: Click purchase button to complete order
Then I should see appropriate response for order "valid_order"
